price: Mu by’ukuri, ingoro ya mbere yashyiriweho abantu (kugira ngo isengerwemo Allah) ni ya yindi iri i Baka (Maka); yuje imigisha ikaba n’umuyoboro ku biremwa.
arabic: إِنَّ أَوَّلَ بَيۡتٖ وُضِعَ لِلنَّاسِ لَلَّذِي بِبَكَّةَ مُبَارَكٗا وَهُدٗى لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna awwala baytin wuḍiʿa lilnnāsi lalladhī bibakkata mubārakan wahudan lil'ʿālamīna
